text: Crew is a 2024 Indian Hindi-language heist comedy movie. The movie stars Tabu, Kareena Kapoor, Kriti Sanon, Diljit Dosanjh and Kapil Sharma. It is directed by Rajesh A Krishnan and produced by Balaji Motion Pictures, Anil Kapoor Films & Communication Network and Digvijay Purohit. == Cast == * Tabu as Geeta Sethi * Kareena Kapoor Khan as Jasmine Kohli * Kriti Sanon as Divya Rana * Diljit Dosanjh as Jaiveer Singh * Kapil Sharma as Arun Sethi * Rajesh Sharma as Pruthviraj Mittal * Saswata Chatterjee as Vijay Walia * Kulbhushan Kharbanda as Nanu * Trupti Khamkar as S.I. Mala * Charu Shankar as Sudha Mittal * Ramakany Dayma as Mr. Rajvanshi == Production == The movie was announced in Novembr 2022 and start filming on 25 March 2023 and end in February 2024. The movie was shot in Mumbai, Goa and Abu Dhabi. == Release == It was originally planned for a 22 March 2024 release, the movie was theatrically released on 29 March 2024 in the occasion of Good Friday. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2024 comedy movies Category:2020s Indian movies
title: Crew (movie)
